Actually, it is a lot. Alot is not a word. Look in any dictionary; it's not there. A lot IS an expression which means many, because the word lot can mean a huge group of something, so when you say a lot, it means it is A lot of something, kind of like saying A dozen or A couple. I know this because when I was younger and made this mistake, people corrected me, which was helpful. What is not helpful is people correcting me when they don't know the answers themselves. ALOT IS NOT A WORD.
